description: This coconut curry marinade only calls for five ingredients, but delivers big time on flavour. It's easy to make and pairs perfectly with chicken, tofu or beef sirloin.
keywords: Marinade & rubs,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Spring,Nov 2020,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Coconut Curry Marinade Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place all indredients in a bowl and mix until well combined. Use to marinate chicken thigh fillets, tofu, cauliflower steaks, beef rump or sirloin.
